Class Play

  • java.lang.Object
    • cli.Play

  • public class Play
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • playerTurn

        private boolean playerTurn(Player playerAttack,
                           Player playerDefend,
                           java.util.Scanner scan)
        Plays a given players turn
        Parameters:
        playerAttack - player whose turn it is
        playerDefend - other player
        scan - scanner used to get input from the console
        Returns:
        boolean false if the player chooses to end the game, false otherwise

      • readBombPosition

        private java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> readBombPosition(java.lang.String position)
        Reads the position of a bomb from a string
        Parameters:
        position - string containing the bomb position in letters
        Returns:
        vector with true or false indicating if the reading was successful, the line (number) and the column of the position

      • printAttackResult

        void printAttackResult(Player playerAttack,
                       Player playerDefend,
                       Position position,
                       java.lang.String message,
                       java.util.Scanner scan)
        After an attack, prints the result in the console
        Parameters:
        playerAttack - player whose attack it was
        playerDefend - other player
        position - position that was attacked
        message - message indicating success or failure of the attack
        scan - scanner used to get input from the console
